data.actual_result: The box doesn't go away, and clicking "Save Changes" does not work.
data.expected_result: The "You Have Unsaved Changes" box should dismiss itself when you switch back
data.short_description: Manually reverting changes doesnt dismiss "unsaved changes" box
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the Overview tab in server settings - Change the default notification to a different value - Change it back to what you previously had
